page.description: The A5_SS_GET() function creates a pointer to the specified stylesheet. Internal stylesheet function
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = a5_ss_get(P pResult ,C style )

argument.name: pResult
argument.description: A pointer variable that becomes the stylesheet pointer.

argument.name: style
argument.description: The name of the stylesheet. Use A5_STYLESHEET_ENUM()to get a list of styles.

page.example: dim ssh as P ? a5_ss_get(ssh, "Avant Garden") = .T.
